name: Word Drill
description:
Word Drill

Word Drill is a simple word game where the player attempts to discover a secret word by guessing letters within a limited number of tries.

Correctly placed letters are highlighted in green, while letters that are present in the mystery word but not guessed in the correct location, are highlighted in blue.  Players may only guess valid words.

---

You can play in browser, or download the executable to play offline.  The downloaded executable will better support any resolution.

---

Donations via the download button are absolutely not needed but always greatly appreciated <3

Cheers,

John
